channel.description: Recent content in elasticsearch on Bandit

item.title: Autocomplete in Depth
item.description: Autocomplete is annoying. What types of searches can autocomplete help with? When the query is a genre. When the query is a language. When the query is a cast member. When the query is a production company. When the query is a country. When the query is an IMDB ID. When the query is a keyword. When the query is a movie title. What are the different approaches to autocomplete?
